query.q: R::`view`:(count(view_id)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}

R::view:(percentile(`loading_time`,75)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}

R::view:(count(view_id) as PV) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}

R::view:(percentile(`loading_time`,75) as `P75(加载耗时)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}

R::view:(count(session_id) as `会话数`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by view_name

R::view:(percentile(`loading_time`,75) as `P75(加载时间)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by view_name

R::view:(percentile(`time_spent`,75) as `P75(停留时间)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by view_name

links.alias: 跳转到 [Long task 查看器]

settings.titleDesc: 当前时间范围内，发生过长任务的 PV 数量占总 PV  数量的比率。

children.q: R::view:(count(view_id)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `view_long_task_count` >0 and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}

R::view:(count(view_id)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}

query.q: eval(A/B, alias='长任务机率', A="R::view:(count(view_id)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `view_long_task_count` >0 and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}", B="R::view:(count(view_id)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}")

R::long_task:(percentile(`duration`,75) as `耗时`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}

settings.titleDesc: 当前时间段内不同按键的操作次数及发生长任务次数。（此处长任务判断逻辑：操作执行时间超过 50 ms ，则视为该次操作发生了长任务）

query.q: R::action:(count(action_name) as `操作次数`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by action_name

R::action:(count(duration) as `长任务发生次数`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `duration` > 50000000 and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by action_name

R::resource:(count(resource_type)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by resource_type

R::resource:(count(resource_url_host) as `资源数`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by resource_url_host

R::resource:(percentile(`resource_size`,50) as `P50(资源大小)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by resource_url_host

R::resource:(last(resource_url_host) as `域名`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by resource_url_path_group

R::resource:(count(resource_url) as `资源数`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by resource_url_path_group

R::resource:(percentile(`duration`,50) as `P50(加载时间)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by resource_url_path_group

R::resource:(percentile(`resource_size`,50) as `P50(资源大小)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by resource_url_path_group

R::view:(percentile(`onload_to_onshow`,75) as `P75(onload_to_onshow)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}

R::view:(percentile(onshow_to_onready,75) as `P75(onshow_to_onready)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}

R::view:(percentile(`first_paint_time`,75) as `P75(首次渲染)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_name` = '#{view_name}' and `device` = '#{device}' and `model` = '#{model}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}

definition.value: R::view:(distinct(model)) {app_id = '#{appid}' and env = '#{env}' and version = '#{version}' and device = '#{device}'}

title: 小程序应用页面性能分析
